summary: Defines a dataclass that aggregates all hyper‑parameters and runtime options needed to train an AlignProp model, covering experiment naming, logging/tracking, checkpoint handling, precision and optimizer settings, sampling behavior, and advanced training tricks such as truncated back‑propagation and negative prompts.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to configure, reproduce, and manage AlignProp training runs in a consistent and flexible manner, supporting experiment tracking, resource optimization, and advanced training techniques.
